subject: RE: 回复：Re: Re: Re: Re: Order #SSN1430 confirmed
description_text:
Dears,

Any news?


________________________________
De: Daniel Carvalho <dcarvalho96.dc@gmail.com>
Enviada: Terça-feira, 13 de Maio de 2025 14:59
Para: General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>
Assunto: RE: 回复：Re: Re: Re: Re: Order #SSN1430 confirmed

Hi,

Please find attached invoice.

Total amout: EUR 53,36

[cid:e67d2f05-df19-4fe5-b6e9-6b825bb1643c]

Waiting for your refund.

Thanks in advance.

Daniel Carvalho

________________________________
De: General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>
Enviada: Segunda-feira, 12 de Maio de 2025 10:27
Para: Daniel Carvalho <dcarvalho96.dc@gmail.com>
Assunto: 回复：Re: Re: Re: Re: Order #SSN1430 confirmed

Hello, please provide us with your last bill and we will refund it for you, please don't worry


Daniel Carvalho<dcarvalho96.dc@gmail.com> 在 2025年5月12日 周一 17:24 写道：
Thank you very much.

1) Just two more questions, did you always send the accessories for the pedals?

2) In the previous shipment, from Handbrake, I paid the taxes at the time of purchase and on delivery. The UPS carrier says they won't refund my taxes because they didn't have the IOSS. Is it possible for you to return it? Or try to solve the problem?


Com os melhores cumprimentos,

Daniel Carvalho


General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com<mailto:service@simsonn.com>> escreveu em seg., 12/05/2025 às 10:22 :
Hi, here's your order invoice, sorry for the delay, we've just finished our holidays.


Daniel Carvalho<dcarvalho96.dc@gmail.com<mailto:dcarvalho96.dc@gmail.com>> 在 2025年5月12日 周一 16:27 写道：
Dears,

Please note I need urgently the your invoice with IOSS number! If I don't get the invoice, I'll pay the amount again. So you'll have to send me a refund.

Com os melhores cumprimentos,

Daniel Carvalho

Daniel Carvalho

Daniel Carvalho

Of Course.

Dears,

Thanks!
From what I've just spoken to Portuguese customs, I'll need your IOSS number on the invoice! It’s possible?

Com os melhores cumprimentos,

Daniel Carvalho


General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com<mailto:service@simsonn.com>> escreveu em qui., 8/05/2025 às 09:58 :
Okay, we'll send you an upgrade kit. Our IOSS tax ID number is: IM4420001405

Dears,

From what I've just spoken to Portuguese customs, I'll need your IOSS number on the invoice! It’s possible?

Com os melhores cumprimentos,

Daniel Carvalho


Daniel Carvalho <dcarvalho96.dc@gmail.com<mailto:dcarvalho96.dc@gmail.com>> escreveu em qua., 7/05/2025 às 21:02 :
Dears,

Please note that I will need your IOSS (Import One-Stop Shop) number, commercial invoice and all declarations to present to Portuguese customs.

By the way, I'd like to take advantage of this email to ask you about the partnership we talked about a while ago. You mentioned sending some accessories for the pedals.

Com os melhores cumprimentos,

Daniel Carvalho

conversations.body_text: Hello, we have refunded you the tax charged in advance, please check it out.

Hi,

Well received. Thanks for your support.

About the partnership, do you any updates? You talk about the new
acessories. It’s possible send to me and I can make one TikTok with the
product. Similar to the next link, my video about shifter.
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZGd5Kf7Wb/
If you want, can share.

Com os melhores cumprimentos,

*Daniel Carvalho*


service@simsonn.com
